text: Whoppers are malted milk balls with an artificial flavored "chocolatey coating". They are produced by The Hershey Company. The candy is a round ball about 3‚ÅÑ4 inch (20 mm). In 1947, Overland merged with Chicago Biscuit Company, Leaf Gum, and Laf Machinery. Two years later, Leaf Brands reintroduced malted milk balls under the name of "Whoppers". Category:Candy Category:The Hershey Company
title: Whoppers
